text:
Email sent by tobiasreif@pinkjuice.com on 12/10/2001 to vincent.hardy@sun.com :
Hi,
...
In this SVG
   http://www.rubynewbies.com/~tobi/h_osource_news.rb?IEHack=.svg
, there are dx and dy attributes on many tspan elements. The Adobe SVG 
Viewer (ASV) renders it as intended, Batik 1.1 seems to ignore the dx, 
and seems to interpret the dy differently than ASV3.
creator: vincent.hardy@sun.com
